Amar Ben Belgacem (June 18, 1979 - August 24, 2010) bụ onye France-Tunisia na-ese ihe.
Amar Ben Belgacem bụ onye nne na nna Tunisian, ọ tolitere na France ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
N'afọ 1984, ndị mụrụ ya kpebiri ịlaghachi Tunisia, na-akpọrọ Belgacem na ejima ya
Ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, ọ biri n'otu obodo nke ọ kọwara dị ka "ihe osise" n'ihi na o nwere ogige mara mma, ọtụtụ ihe osise, nchịkọta ihe, akwụkwọ nka, na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara nka.
Onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, a na-anọchite anya ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze na nke onwe na mba iri abụọ.
N'abalị abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2006, minista na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị na ihe nketa mere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọrụ nke ọdịbendị Tunisia.

Ọ bụ onye otu International association of plastic arts, European association for plastic arts, mba ụwa academy nke Lutèce, njikọ nke ndị na-ese plastik nke Tunisia, na njikọ nke ndị omenkà plastik nke Hammamet.
